A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Was insanely good. Emotionally beautiful\, action wise perfect and cinematography unbeatable. Characters were written and developed well\, constant moments of questioning and leaving you on the edge of your seat\, it was almost perfect.\n\nOnly criticism I can give is the lack of a strong melody in the movie and the lack of information about Snoke before his death. Otherwise\, it was almost perfect. Best Star Wars movie for sure\, and if not\, definitely top 3 easily.
